FuncDef: This command checks a compact flash device for errors and repairs any errors found.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the compact flash slot ID to be shut down or enabled. When a specific cflash-id is specified, then that drive is shut down. If no flash-id is specified, the drive referred to by the current working directory is assumed. If a slot number is not specified, then the active CSM is assumed. Values-cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:. ParamDefault: Default- the current compact flash device.
